name: Selection Box by Auto Layout
description:
A “button” with a selection icon by auto layout.


基于Auto Layout带有选中标签的"按钮"。


Using Auto Layout to design it, because we need let the width of center aligned text button be "auto" .


因为需要让按钮依据居中文本宽度自适应，所以使用AutoLayout来实现。


Notice that the key is that all X,Y position of elements in "frame" can be changed in to any value, so that you can make the checked icon looks like in the button corner, but in fact it is in the right place of the button, and the checked icon will not displayed out of button.


关键思路在于frame内部的元素是可以基于frame偏移的。所以，可以将frame放置在按钮右侧，并且让内部的元素向左偏移。这样，看上去选中标签就在内部了，同时不会因为Auto Layout而显示在按钮外侧。


At same time, the copy of the empty instance of the icon is on the left side of button, so that each side has 1px white space and will be easy to align center.


同时将按钮左侧也复制了一个空白的组件，这样就保证两侧各空出1像素的大小，方便快速使用快捷键将它居中。
